RCOMP-2B3.MX.short_name: SAM ASSET MANAGEMENT SA DE CV F
RCOMP-2B3.MX.long_name: Fondo SAM Renta Variable 2, S.A. de C.V. F.I.R.V. B3
RCOMP-2B3.MX.summary: The fundamental objective of the Fund is to protect 100% of the investor's initial capital and yield performance over the term of "Term Capital Protection". The Fund will also seek to provide additional performance. The commitment to protect capital and base performance and the possibility of further performance, apply as long as the investments remain until the end of the "Term Capital Protection", so to obtain such benefits investors should not make sales early partial or until the end of the "term Capital Protection".
RCOMP-2B3.MX.family: SAM Asset Management SA de CV

RCOMP-RB.MX.short_name: SAM ASSET MANAGEMENT SA DE CV F
RCOMP-RB.MX.long_name: Fondo SAM Deuda Corto Plazo 1, S.A. de C.V. F.I.I.D. B
RCOMP-RB.MX.summary: The Fund's objective is to act as "Fund collector" for investors who wish to participate in investment companies that guarantee stated in the prospect of the same, i.e. capital and a guaranteed base performance as well as the possibility of an additional performance, can do it through the acquisition of shares of the Fund, since they may not acquire shaped direct actions of the Extra funds and thereforethe resources of the Fund will be part of the assets of each fund Extra
RCOMP-RB.MX.family: SAM Asset Management SA de CV
